headline.main: Petain Calls New Economic Regime Vital to French Industry's Future; Directed Economy Forced by War Conditions, He Says in Defense of Committees -- Task of Survey Commission Is Outlined

lead_paragraph: VICHY, Nov. 16 -- In a message he addressed to the commission appointed to study economic organization, Marshal Petain, Chief of State, explained the task he had set for this commission. He did not attempt to conceal that criticism had been aimed at the organization of committees.
abstract: Petain message explains task he set for comm apptd to study econ organization
